programme.title: Matahari Cerah Lagi
programme.desc: Suha, seorang wanita yang sentiasa bernasib malang. Dia diseksa oleh ibu tiri selepas kematian bapanya. Kemudian, soal harta keluarga pula dibangkitkan.

There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

Under the watchful eye of Fuji-san Justine will share dishes inspired by the journey and the produce that makes Shizuoka such a unique place... in such a unique country. Along the way Justine will learn the secrets to making soba noodles, Japanese sweets known as Wagashi and authentic soy sauce.

programme.title: 118 S2 - EP 104
programme.desc: (R) Ke Ai looks for Shun Shui, and tries her best to calm him down, telling him that mistakes are bound to occur and it is only wise to learn from them. (PG)(重)可爱找到顺水，好言相劝，顺水说118亏钱都是他一意孤行的错，可爱指犯错是成功之路，只要从错误中学习，还是会有成功的一天。至于达明对他的指责虽然严厉，但也不无道理，就当是当头棒喝，顺水却仍然闹别扭。.

programme.title: 小鲤鱼历险记 The Adv Of Little Carp - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) The beautiful Carps Lake suffers the scourge of the evil snake. The small Carp Pao Pao was forced to swim out of his desolate homeland in search of the power of the dragon. He makes the acquaintances of the cowardly two-sided turtle, the arrogant A Ku and the delicate Mei Mei. (重)美丽的鲤鱼湖遭受了癞皮蛇的祸害，小鲤鱼泡泡被迫游出凄凉的家乡，寻找龙的力量。他先后结识了胆小的双面龟，傲气的阿酷，娇柔的美美。.

programme.title: 三个愿望 Three Wishes - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) Yaozong suddenly loses all his memory since he was 10 years old and forgets about Shanmei and his children. Everyone knows that this is the price to pay for a wish and Shanmei reveals the secret of the last wish. No matter who uses the last wishing coin, the price is Yaozong's death and the last wishing coin is nowhere to be found. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)耀宗突然失去了10岁以后的记忆，把善美和孩子们都忘了，大家心知这是许愿后付出的代价，善美也说出了最后一个愿望的秘密。原来不管谁用了最后一个愿望钱币，代价是耀宗会死，而最后一个愿望钱币已经不见。.

programme.desc: Famous rogue lawyer Josephus Tan and his mother will share their experiences in life with us. Healthy food will not be boring Chef Cao Yong will share yummy Cantonese dishes while Chinese physician Guo Mei Ling will teach you home remedies for itchy skin (pruritus). 一道料理,一段人生故事,著名的流氓律师陈俊良和妈妈在成长道路上经历了哪些酸甜苦辣 张学友,甄妮,齐秦, 姜鄠,那些90年代的流行金曲又会换起你哪些沉睡的记忆呢无论是曹勇师傅带来的80年代传统粤菜还是郭美伶医师的食疗方,一定都能让你吃出健康,尽享美味!

programme.title: 我的左邻右里 Dear Neighbours - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) On the deadline for the submission of the En Bloc proposal, Wei Ren's computer breaks down unexpectedly. Wei Ren bumps into Ting Xuan when he is on his way to fix the computer. Ting Xuan recommends him an expert to fix it and he manages to submit the proposal in time. Wei Ren notices Ting Xuan's strengths. He changes his impression towards her, which improves their relationship. (PG)(重)为人在截止日期当天，做完集体销售计划书，不料电脑突然坏了。他十万火急赶着去修电脑，遇到庭萱。庭萱介绍一位超级厉害的电脑专家帮他修好电脑，让他及时交上计划书。为人看到庭萱的优点，对她改观，两人关系改善。.

programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8. （现场直播）总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 白色强人 Big White Duel - EP 9
programme.desc: (Part 1) Tang Ming performs surgery for Zhongxue in private. He notices that the cancer has spread to Zhongxue's spine, leaving him no choice but to stop the surgery. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(第9集上)仲学病情恶化，唐明决定私下为他动手术，却发现他的癌细胞已扩散至脊椎，被迫终止手术。.

programme.title: 超级同学会 Super Reunion - EP 4
programme.desc: 《超级同学会》由从华视入学的“佼佼”黄子佼、“阿亮”卜学亮领军，将召开一场场充满欢笑、泪水、惊喜的同学会，对演艺圈如数家珍的两位大学长，将号召综艺王国、戏剧界以及音乐圈的同学们，为您献上经典男团女团、动人金曲、好久不见的大牌巨星，还有势必将再造另一股风潮的经典游戏 !

programme.title: 单翼天使 My Guardian Angels - EP 4
programme.desc: Mandy hears from her daughter, Xie Ying, that her boyfriend, Justin, is earning fast money through virtual currency investment. Mandy then decides to invest five thousand dollars to test waters and indeed earns a few thousand dollars. She then increases her investment to fifty thousand dollars and takes Xie Ying to shopping, buying branded shoes again so that people will not look down on her. (PG)Mandy从女儿谢颖处得知其男友Justin投资虚拟货币，短时间内就赚了钱。Mandy心动，决定拿出5千元投资试温度，果然短期内就赚了几千元，她于是加大投资，投入5万元，还和谢颖出门开心购物，为了不让人看不起，又花巨款买下名牌高跟鞋。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 焦点 Focus - EP 2
programme.desc: Focus provides timely reports and analyses on international news and current affairs from Singapore's perspective. 《焦点》追踪国际时事，实地报道区域课题，以新加坡的视角分析时局发展的前因后果和潜在影响。.

programme.title: 巨轮II Brother's Keeper S2 - EP 22
programme.desc: (R) Kailin is embarrassed when she learned that Weixin overheard her confessing her feelings about him. Guo Bao snatches Zhongying's necklace to clear his debt, they have a tiff.Nana is happy when Weixin texts her that he is coming to Okinawa. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)当凯琳坦言对威信有好感时，被站在背后的威信听到，凯琳感到尴尬。国宝被文泰追债至走投无路，再向钟颖拿钱，更出手抢其钻石链，钟颖离家向先柏哭诉.收到威信将要来冲绳岛的简讯，娜娜心暗欢喜。.

programme.title: 蜀山战纪之剑侠传奇 The Legend Of S - EP 45
programme.desc: (R) Mt Shu is Jiang Hu's number one sect for many years. In order to protect the world from harm, Zhuge Yuwo placed the enchanted gem into Ding Yin's body to prevent it from being stolen. Later, Ding Yin went to Mt Shu to practise his sword skills, aiming to seek revenge on Lv Pao. (PG)(重)蜀山派是江湖第一名门正派，一直领导武林多年。蜀山掌门诸葛驭我为保天下，对抗企图抢夺赤魂石的绿袍尊者，把赤魂石打入天赋异秉的丁隐体内，丁隐由此拜入蜀山门下修习剑法，誓要练成蜀山绝学，替天下百姓向绿袍尊者寻仇。.

programme.title: 邻里合作社 United Neighbours Society - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) In each episode, we will zoom in on a residential estate where our two rival artistes will pit against each other to garner help from the residents to form their own "dream team". Each team will then embark on the task of decorating a 8 to 10 feet tall structure into an art piece within a given time. The winning art piece will then be decided by votes from MPs, arts professionals, as well as residents staying nearby. (重)两名主持人，各自找来一名〝达邻〞，帮忙在该区寻找10名组屋居民加入队伍。每队要在限时内以各种材料装饰一尊大型雕像。每集的雕像不一样，但都是一些可以代表新加坡的标志／物件，如狮子、椰树和胡姬花等。比赛结束后，该区居民、议员和美术专家们会进行投票，选出优胜队伍。节目宗旨：希望透过节目提倡睦邻精神、种族和谐及社区凝聚力，促进邻里彼此互动与了解。.

programme.desc: (R) A contemporary love story about a dancer who falls for a terminally ill doctor. It is the first serial that includes familiar faces from 1993's Star Search talent quest. (重).

programme.title: 陆游与唐琬 Lu You And Tang Wan
programme.desc: 诗人陆游年轻时娶表妹诗名卓著的“苏门四学士"之一晁补之的孙女唐琬为妻。夫妻二人诗书唱和，感情深厚。但因陆母不喜唐琬，恐误其儿前程，威逼二人各自另行嫁娶。在陆游百般劝谏、哀求而无效的情势下，二人终于被迫分离，唐琬改嫁赵士程，彼此音息隔绝无闻。.

programme.title: 欢喜没烦恼 Happy-Go-Lucky - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) As Singapore progresses to become a smart nation, the folks at Happy Street strive to upgrade themselves to catch up with the times. They move out of Happy Street this week for some self-upgrading classes. On the other hand, Hong Kong actor Kenneth Chan brings the crew to a senior activity centre where he finds a 68-year-old lady. She is not only a lion dance troupe member but also a Cantonese opera singer! (重)随着我国快速成为智慧国，欢喜街的大大小小都紧跟时代步伐，不断自我提升。这个星期，欢喜街的街坊到外头上课，很是热闹。说到热闹，久违的香港艺人陈启泰也拉队来到香港的一个乐龄活动中心，听说他在这里找到一位68岁的大姐，能舞狮头，又会唱越剧！.

programme.title: 身在异乡非异客 Strangers At Home - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) This week, we explore those with Southeast Asian roots in Taiwan. Since the arrival of the Burmese Chinese in the 1950s, and the influx of Southeast Asian labourers in the 1990s, interracial marriages have flourished. Yet, they remain viewed as "foreigners". How have they tried to assimilate? (重)最先来到台湾的东南亚群体，是50年代移居台湾的缅甸华人。在90年代，台湾人开始大量雇用东南亚劳工和帮佣，同时台湾男性娶东南亚配偶的人数也越来越多。自此，东南亚群体便在台湾落脚、生根。虽然近年来政府投注大量资源援助新住民和二代适应社会，但内心深处，台湾社会对于这些所谓的“新台湾人”，总是怀着抗拒的心态。即使在台湾生活了许多年，这些新住民二代混血儿、外籍配偶、缅甸华人，还是被贴上了“外来的”标签。为了融入主流社会，他们付出多少努力？.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) From creatively-styled dishes to simple delights found in Taiwan, Host Danny Yeo explores delectable food inspired by the works of four notable Taiwanese authors. (重)从气派十足的创意料理到朴实恬淡的家常小菜，这一趟台湾之旅，主持人杨君伟透过四位作家的笔触，探索台湾的暖心美食，品尝透过味蕾触发内心情感的飨宴。.

(PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)新星独自一人在张家感到害怕，听到娜妍叫她的声音，独自下楼时不小心跌倒。泰俊回到家发现新星倒卧在地，立刻送她入院。.

programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Daojing destroyed Director Zhang and his mother's wedding ceremony. Director Zhang makes use of disgruntled Taizhen to take revenge on Daojing. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)道京毁了张会长和他的母亲的婚礼。气愤的张会长打算利用怨气满腹的振泰对付道京予以报复。.

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 37
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Jiaying finds out that she is pregnant on the day that Zhenghan is leaving the country. Jiaying attempts to rush to the airport to stop Zhenghan, but she is pushed down a flight of stairs by Shina. Yingyu refuses to acknowledge Jiaying's baby as her grandchild. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)佳英在正韩出国当天发现自己怀孕了。佳英联络不到正韩，于是想前往机场拦截正韩，却被世娜推下楼梯。几个月后佳英挺着肚子到尹家，哀求英玉告诉她正韩的下落，英玉却说不会承认佳英肚子里的孩子，要佳英不要找正韩。.

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 38
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Jiaying gives birth to a boy. Five years later, no one has much news about Zhenghan. Shina has considerable influence in the YB group and is put in-charge of the YB City project. Shina suspects that Zhenghan is the mastermind behind a series of negative reports about YB City online. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)佳英顺利产下男婴，取名韩尹秀。五年过去了，但大家仍然没有正韩的音讯。世娜在公司已经跟贤基平起平坐了，并被安排策划大规模商场 – YB城市。有人在网上大肆散播YB城市不可能成功的文章，令世娜怀疑正韩在背后搞鬼。.

programme.title: 歌手2018 Singer 2018 - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) This series features a modification to the Challenge rounds, with the Challenger entering the competition starting at the knockout rounds instead of Challenge round (where a new substitute singer would enter the competition instead). Challengers must avoid last place on their first week in addition to finishing in top four on the second week (in a combination of both knockout and challenge rounds) to be declared safe; failing either challenge instantly eliminates the singer from the competition. (重)《歌手2018》与往季竞演结束后统一投票的操作方式有所不同，本季光临现场的大众听审们有两次机会行使投票权力，而新增的这一次机会是“预投票”环节。“预投票”环节，是指500位大众听审在前四位出场歌手中选择一名进行一轮“预投票”。该节目的首发歌手为汪峰、Jessie J、李圣杰、张韶涵、GAI、张天、李晓东；补位歌手为李泉、华晨宇、腾格尔、郁可唯；踢馆歌手为苏诗丁、KZ·谭定安、霍尊，由张韶涵担任该节目的首位女性音乐串讲人。.

programme.title: 30分钟煮一餐 Quick Cuisine - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Career is still pretty much a dominant part of Singaporeans' lives. As such, most Singaporeans resort to eating out rather than going home to enjoy a sumptuous home-cooked meal. Working mothers always aspire to let their children and family enjoy a nutritious home-cooked meal. Hence, Quick Cuisine offers to inform all on how to prepare a meal in 30 minutes or less. (重)人们经常在外用餐，其实心里都非常渴望吃家常菜，尤其是忙碌的职业妇女虽然有女佣代劳，难得下厨，不过她们其实也很希望在特别的日子里，为家人和孩子准备美食。因此，为忙碌的专业和工作人士提供容易处理而且又营养丰富的食谱和烹饪秘诀，将会广受欢迎。.

Yalan apologises to Wu Chun and wants her to return to their family, but Wu Chun refuses to do so. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)吴春拆穿雅兰其实早就知道她是波兰，但因为知道真相后更加讨厌她，所以才没说出真相。雅兰无可否认，向吴春道歉，要她回家，两人好好相处。吴春不接雅兰的建议，结果被雅兰嘲讽一番。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 44

programme.title: 医生们 Doctors - EP 15

(PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)圣钟发现斗植并没有交出儿子明勋全部的秘密资金细节后，生气地冲到斗植的病房向他宣战，并宣称会对智弘下手。斗植又气又急，因脑栓塞晕倒，智弘拚尽全力地抢救也无能为力。。。。。。.

(PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)由于斗植的去世，圣钟如愿以偿地就任了理事长，儿子明勋成了院长。智弘和慧静在食堂吃饭时，碰上了仁珠和波澜，智弘干脆向他们公开了和慧静的恋爱关系。仁珠说会为他俩守住秘密。.

(重)锦鲤在日本被誉为水中的活宝石。每年10月是日本锦鲤收成季节，全世界的买家都飞往新潟县小千古市购买锦鲤。特派员黄靖伦也接受委托，到锦鲤之乡协助锦鲤运输，此外还要下泥池协助锦鲤收成和学习如何挑选名贵锦鲤。他能否完成任务？.

programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Dalina heads over to land of a thousand temples, where karma is believed to be the cause of medical conditions and defects like cleft lip or cataract. Yet, these conditions can be easily corrected with surgery. Together with John Fawcett Foundation, and her fellow Malay volunteer, Izzat, Dalina sets out to convince villagers to accept medical treatment despite their beliefs that this is god's punishment. She witnesses a young couple make the tough decision to allow their infant to undergo cleft lip surgery, and a grown man who requests for cleft lip surgery despite having lived with it for nearly thirty years. Dalina also organises a game session for a young cleft palate patient to encourage her to open up and make friends.

programme.title: Di Hujung Pelangi - EP 7
programme.desc: Host: Norfasarie'Di Hujung Pelangi' takes a look at the inspirational journeys of these special families who have learn to accept and embrace life's challenges by moving their lives forward in the most positive direction. Cerebral palsy (CP) is a condition caused by injury to the parts of the brain that control our ability to use our muscles and bodies. Cerebral means having to do with the brain. Palsy means weakness or problems with using the muscles. Often the injury happens before birth, sometimes during delivery, or, soon after being born.Sometimes children with CP can also have learning problems, problems with hearing or seeing (called sensory problems), or intellectual disabilities. This episode will recount a family's early days of dealing with their child cerebral palsy. We will also feature Kashif and Hashimah Hamidon- the people behind the I Am Speciable movement to find out the objectives behind this movement and their journey with Cerebral Palsy.

programme.desc: Laugh out loud to comedy scenes from Kollywood films, right here on Vasantham!

programme.title: LKG
programme.desc: A local Councillor, Lalgudi Karupiah Gandhi, contests in a by-election as a candidate to become an MLA with the aid of a political strategist, Sara, against a powerful MLA Ramraj Pandian.

programme.title: Indian Beat 11 (HD) - EP 2
programme.desc: Indian Beat is a bilingual magazine show that serves as an excellent platform by featuring the activities and events organized by the various Indian ethnic organizations around Singapore.

programme.title: Tamil Seithi - EP 10
programme.desc: Tamil Daily News.

programme.title: Maayanadhi
programme.desc: Maayanadhi is the tale of a doting father and his daughter, who aspires to become a doctor.

programme.title: Tamil Seithi - EP 10
programme.desc: Tamil Daily News.

programme.title: Vasantham Cafe S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Vasantham Cafe gets re-opened after 8 years by Bukit Batok Baby & Potong Pasir Papa! A loving married couple visits the Caf only to be carried away by the hilarious commotion that occurs there! And get ready to be mesmerized by several exciting performances by our Vasantham Celebrities and an amazing Ilaiyaraaja mash-up by R.V Ganesan & Kalai Vaani!

programme.title: Ha Ha Ha Sirippu 2018 - EP 2
programme.desc: Laugh out loud to comedy scenes from Kollywood films, right here on Vasantham!

programme.title: Veera Pandiya Katta Bhooman
programme.desc: Veerapandiya Kattabomman, the king of Panchalankurichi, discovers that the British are trying to create unrest in his domain. His battle against the British forms the crux of the story.

programme.title: Yeh Jawani Hai Deewani
programme.desc: Kabir, a guy who wants to make it big in the travel industry, meets Naina during a trekking trip. She falls for him but refrains from expressing it. Years later they meet at a friend's wedding.

programme.title: Going Underground
programme.desc: Deep beneath the bustling streets of Singapore lies a subterranean world that few have seen or heard of before.

programme.title: Licences and Pace Notes
programme.desc: To race in Rally GB, Mike Chen needs to get his competition licence. Then, it's time to meet his co-driver. In order to be allowed to race in Rally GB, Mike Chen first needs to pass the test for his competition licence. Then, it’s time to meet his co-driver, who begins to teach Mike the language of pace notes with an innovative training tool.

programme.title: Test drives and training
programme.desc: Mike Chen is off to Ireland to meet Citroën driver Craig Breen for some real-world rally experience. Mike Chen heads to Waterford, Ireland to get some real-world experience with Citroën factory driver Craig Breen. Mike learns that training behind the wheel isn't enough to be able to compete in a race like Wales Rally GB.

programme.title: Jokke’s adventure on the Troll Wall
programme.desc: Wingsuit flyers Jokke Sommer, Espen Fadnes and Felix Lorentzen jump from the Troll Wall in Norway. The Troll Wall in Norway’s Romsdal Alps is the tallest vertical rock face in Europe at around 1,100m (3,600ft) from its base to its summit. Watch Norwegian wingsuit flyers Jokke Sommer, Espen Fadnes and Felix Lorentzen jump from the famous landmark.

programme.title: From Denmark to Team SoloMid
programme.desc: A young player from Denmark makes an impression on the hottest gaming team in the United States. Søren 'Bjergsen' Bjerg, a young player from Denmark, goes from playing local tournaments to landing a spot on the hottest gaming team in the United States. Raw skill may have got him there, but Bjergsen has a lot to learn about becoming a champion.

programme.title: Trial by fire
programme.desc: Bjergsen must now prove himself at the highest level in the world as the new captain of Team SoloMid. As the newly-minted captain of Team SoloMid, Bjergsen must now face the highest level of competition with the world watching. Mechanics and skill are one thing, but does he have what it takes to lead his team to victory?

programme.title: Arrival and exploration
programme.desc: Join Dominik Gührs as he arrives in his favourite city, Bangkok, on the hunt for perfect wakeboarding spots. Wakeboarder Dominik Gührs is on a tour of his favourite city: Thailand's capital, Bangkok. He's on the hunt for the best spots to wakeboard in. Travel with Dominik as he flies in from Munich, Germany.

programme.title: Hitting the decks
programme.desc: Dominik Gührs learns some DJ skills from Thai DJ Bomba Selecta and meets up with a graffiti artist. Wakeboarder Dominik Gührs meets up with Thai DJ Bomba Selecta and learns a few things about DJing, which he debuts at a party later, but not until he's checked out some Bangkok street art.

programme.title: Drop Everything
programme.desc: Matchstick Productions present a light-hearted approach to slope-side action, featuring world-class skiers. With tongues firmly in cheeks, Matchstick Productions present a light-hearted approach to the passion behind slope-side action. Sit back and enjoy stunning scenery, awesome tricks from world-class skiers and belly-laughing comedy.

programme.title: Logistics
programme.desc: Nasser Al-Attiyah shares the importance of having the logistics figured out to keep things running smoothly. The logistics of taking on Dakar Rally require a lot of people to be on the same page. Nasser Al-Attiyah shares the importance of having the details figured out in order to keep things running smoothly.

programme.title: Preparation
programme.desc: From maintaining the rally car to being properly equipped, Nasser Al-Attiyah talks about preparing for Dakar. From maintaining the car in top mechanical condition to being properly equipped with tools to reviewing the previous day's activities, Nasser Al-Attiyah and team members talk about preparing for Dakar.

programme.title: The Dakar
programme.desc: Join Nasser Al-Attiyah in the final moments of Dakar Rally 2020 as he fought his way across the finish line. Join Nasser Al-Attiyah in the final moments of Dakar Rally 2020. Check out the events leading up to a very close second place victory as he fought his way across the finish line.

programme.title: England: Small City, Big Sound
programme.desc: DJ Tommie Sunshine visits Fatboy Slim in Brighton, chronicles the fall of The Haçienda and talks to MRK1. In his hometown of Brighton, Fatboy Slim provides a view of life post-superstardom. DJ Tommie Sunshine then travels to Manchester to chronicle the fall of The Haçienda club and talks about Manchester's dubstep origins with MRK1 and Virus Syndicate.

programme.title: Acrobatic Combat
programme.desc: Discover a variety of fascinating and unusual competitive sports enjoyed around the world. Discover the growing sports of competitive slacklining, a combat game played only at the Imperial Japanese Naval Academy, a bloodless, acrobatic sort of bullfight in Spain, and a half-frozen race that could only be conceived of in Canada.

programme.title: Lincoln Skatepark
programme.desc: Joey Brezinski reviews Lincoln Skatepark in Los Angeles to see what it has to offer. Joey Brezinski reviews Lincoln Skatepark in Los Angeles to see what it has to offer. Although it's not his favourite park, Brezinski and 'Rip' still manage to do some shredding.

programme.title: Gardena Skatepark
programme.desc: Joey Brezinski and his friend 'Rip' review the amenities at the skatepark in Arthur Lee Johnson Memorial in Gardena, California. Joey Brezinski and his friend 'Rip' review the amenities at the skatepark in Arthur Lee Johnson Memorial in Gardena, California.

programme.title: Darcy Oake's Trick Fantastic
programme.desc: Illusionist Darcy Oake enlists the help of extreme athletes to push his magic tricks to the next level. World-famous illusionist Darcy Oake stars in a new show, taking his tricks from the stage to the streets. Oake attends the world’s biggest sporting events and brings his own brand of magic to its stars.

programme.title: Chasing the Inca
programme.desc: Darren Berrecloth and friends head deep into the Peruvian jungle as they look to ride a lost Incan road. After the Spanish conquered the Inca, their last emperor, Manco Inca, escaped along a secret, winding, road. Darren Berrecloth and a group of mountain bike adventurers plunge deep into the Peruvian jungle, exploring this lost Incan road.

programme.title: The Mental Game
programme.desc: Ross Edgley heads off to train with Britain's Royal Marines to test how far his mental strength will stretch. To test how far his mental strength will stretch ahead of executing the strongman swimming attempt, Ross Edgley heads off to train with the Royal Marines, Britain's elite amphibious commando force.

programme.title: The Swim
programme.desc: It’s time for Ross Edgley to hit the open water and try and make his strongman swimming dream a reality. The hours of preparation are over, and it’s time for fitness expert Ross Edgley to hit the open waters of the Caribbean and try and make his strongman swimming dream a reality. But how will he fare?

programme.title: The Bad Seeds!
programme.sub-title: A Tireless Quest for Good Snow
programme.desc: Join Team Nitro as they search the world for perfect snow and a perfectly great time. If there's anything to know about snowboarding, it's that A) it's insanely fun and B) Nitro Snowboards have one of the best teams in the game. Follow along as the crew shred across the globe in their tireless quest for good snow and good times.
